channel.title: Whats fun to do in RS?
channel.description:
I often can't find things that are fun to do while playing, I have like 3 weeks left of membership, I would like to make use of them. I just find myself running in circles, I try dungeoneering, get bored half way through and quit, I afk skills and such, but that's not really playing, just finding something else to do, while your character gets ahead. I'm not any good at pking, and I never seem to complete quests, due to the fact that they are kind of boring..
tl;dr: What are some fun things to do in RS besides pking?

item.title: Whats fun to do in RS?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:6, topic:450315”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=553208.msg4053313#msg4053313 date=1342721174]
Trolling kids in F2P
[/quote]
Honestly it’s great.

Grab a friend, get 5m, head to a f2p world with your best shit on. Now go to lumby and say “giving away 5m!! only one trade!!” or something stupid like that. Get your friend to follow to spam for you. Now, once you have maybe 30-40 people, head to draynor manor. Enter the side basement where you need to get the oil canister (or something like that). Once down there, tell them the first person to get the canister from the back wins 5m. Watch chaos erupt, enjoy.[/quote]
That actually sounds fun lol

Read full topic
item.source: Whats fun to do in RS?

item.title: Whats fun to do in RS?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

rip4d:

Trolling kids in F2P

Honestly it’s great.

Grab a friend, get 5m, head to a f2p world with your best shit on. Now go to lumby and say “giving away 5m!! only one trade!!” or something stupid like that. Get your friend to follow to spam for you. Now, once you have maybe 30-40 people, head to draynor manor. Enter the side basement where you need to get the oil canister (or something like that). Once down there, tell them the first person to get the canister from the back wins 5m. Watch chaos erupt, enjoy.
